thag2.37:0.4_0: Right there he applied himself with louded.
thag2.37:1.1_0: Night, with her garland of stars,
thag2.37:1.4_0: this night is really for waking.
thag2.37:2.1_0: Were I to fall from the back of an elephant,
thag2.37:2.2_0: trampled by the tuskers that follow,
thag2.37:2.3_0: better for me to die in battle,
thag2.37:2.4_0: than to live on in defeat.
